Summary: We stayed here for 6 days last week of February 2023.  The hotel is a short 15 minute walk to Disney and right across road from IHOP so we gave it 5 stars for location.  The hotel has been renovated and is very nice.  Staff are very friendly and all of hotel is so clean. There is sometimes a bit of a wait for the elevators but not a big deal. It was too cold to use the pool but it looked very nice.  Laundry room available as well.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location near Disney's best attractions! We're glad to hear your enjoyed our updated spaces as well as our plentiful amenities. Our team will be happy to hear that we made such a positive impact on your visit! We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Please come see us again soon!

Summary: Beautiful clean upgraded hotel. The pool area is very nice with garden and trees. You can enjoy a drink as there is a pool bar. I very happy with our room. We will return to this hotel when we are back in the area. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and rating, comingforthesun!  We're happy that your overall stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was enjoyable and that you were able to take advantage of our pool area. It's great that you appreciated our clean accommodations and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another wonderful visit!  Thank you again for sharing your feedback!

Summary: Lovely hotel, rooms are updated and large. Asked for a high floor and had a view of Disney parks and night time show! Staff were friendly and approachable, accommodated a late checkout at 4pm which was handy for a 10pm flight. Would definitely recommend
Room tip: Ask for higher room, waiting for lifts can be a pain during busy times
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review, 93jacquim!  We are delighted to hear about your experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort and loved our spacious accommodations with beautiful views! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our team. It's wonderful that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future.

Summary: This luxurious hotel had helpful staff and the over night staff helped me and my partner login to the hotel’s wifi. This is a great place to stay if you plan to go to the nearby amusement park! Everything was within walking-distance which includes breakfast downstairs of the hotel. Would highly recommend for anyone going on vacation or just needing to escape to a hotel that has it all.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Rachel!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Thank you again for taking the time to leave your feedback!

Summary: I've now had two stays at this property and can definitely say it's a wonderful value. On both of my stays I've had the opportunity to be in what appears to be recently remodeled rooms that have a decent layout, are clean, and have ample towels. We are marriot Platinum and on both occasions we've received Club lounge access as well as being granted a late checkout. The lounge is perfectly adequate with light snacks in the day (chips, candy, nuts, water, soda, coffee) and some basic appetizers (taquitos, jalapeno poppers, meatballs) and two alcholic drinks (per room) in the evenings. The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland which was great when I needed to return to the room for my son’s nap. I also appreciated the ability to leave our car in the hotel lot until after we were done
Room tip: Rooms with view of Disneyland Fireworks are great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the continued support, Enrique S! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our remodeled rooms, and that you found your space to be well maintained. It is also great to learn that you enjoyed our club lounge and that you were able to take advantage of late checkout. We are happy to hear that you appreciated the short walk to Disneyland, and that you had a fantastic anniversary dinner! We do regret to hear of the water problems in your room due to some nasty storms, but are refreshed to hear that we went above and beyond to ensure we were able to provide you with an excellent experience. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Completely renovated, this hotel, a short walk to Disneyland , was fantastic. The staff member who checked us in (so sorry I can’t remember her name….a blonde Ukrainian woman) was lovely and after an error giving us an accessible room moved us quickly with apologies. The rooms were so well appointed with a terrace, modern furniture including a desk that rises so you can work from different positions…if there for work!….and a beautiful bathroom with a door that closes quietly and a “nite lite” on the mirror.  The only “complaint “ was a very modern thermostat that neither of us could figure out. The room was too warm both evenings. Highly recommend staying here. And it’s reasonably priced, as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, vegasbride07!  We're happy you had a pleasant experience with us! It's lovely you enjoyed our renovated rooms, prime location, friendly staff and well-appointed accommodations so much. That's what we like to see! However, we regret that our temperature control system didn't meet your expectations. We endeavor to offer a top-notch experience for our guests so we'll be sure to discuss your concerns moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for an even better experience!

Summary Heading: Sounds like you are sleeping under the scaffolding at Splash Mountain
Summary: This is the worst place we have stayed at. We are here right now,  past 12. am and we can’t sleep. There is a god awful sound right next to our room that looks like a train is passing by and all the metal frames sound  like it is falling apart. I believe it is the elevator. We have been calling the front desk for 45 minutes now and nobody answers. I don’t usually write a horrible review but I feel like I need to do it, not just because of the mechanical issues and bad experience we are having, but mostly because of the horrible service from front desk that won’t even pick up the phone. Never stay here!
Manager Response: Good morning,  We apologize for the noise issue you are having during your stay. If possible, we would love to move you to a more comfortable room. Please stop by our front desk so we can make sure you are as comfortable as possible going forward.  Thank you.

Summary: My expections were pretty low because of some of the reviews. We chose the Sheraton based on proximity to the parks and it being really resonably priced. I should also say that we aren't easy to please in the hotel department. We've been lucky enough to stay in very nice hotels and it has definitely changed our perspective.  We came with two adults and  two boys ages 4 and 6. My son wet the bed and I was so worried about them cleaning the sheets, because some hotels don't come in and clean your room anymore. We got back from the park and the bed was clean and made up. It was such a relief.  The room was spacious and clean. The bathroom was also suprisingly large for a hotel. The Shampoo, soap, and conditioner provided smelled so nice. We scored a room facing Disney with a
Room tip: room 615 was ours and it came with a deck overlooking the fireworks. Not all rooms have decks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with us, miriamhedin22!  We're delighted to hear you had a fantastic time with us at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. We're so glad you enjoyed our spacious, clean accommodations, beautiful views, facilities, and ideal location so much. We strive to provide our guests with the most enjoyable time possible, so this is wonderful to hear! It sounds like you had a relaxing time with us.  Please come visit us again in the near future for another lovely experience!

Summary: We really missed this property during there remodel now that they are open and the staffing is back - I must send a shout out to Silvia at the front desk your hospitality made our weekend.  Thank you we appreciate everything.
Manager Response: We appreciate the outstanding review, D6002KXcindyf!  We're so glad that you chose to stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's wonderful to know that Silvia had such a positive impact on the quality of your experience. Our staff is dedicated to providing our guests with courteous and attentive service, and we're delighted to know that she went above and beyond in this regard.  We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another excellent experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Thank You Ivan at the Sheraton Pasadena
Summary: I stayed at the Sheraton Pasadena for four evenings on a trip to pick up a rescue dog.  My experience at the hotel was only four nights but it was perfect.  And an employee named Ivan helped make it so.  He helped me with my room, my reservation, local directions, with my car's wifi, with my google maps, and with the rescue dog!!! Oh my gosh,  I simply do not know what I would have done without his cheerful countenance, charm and extreme helpfulness.  Thank you Ivan and the Sheraton Pasadena!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience at Sheraton Pasadena! Unfortunately, we are the Sheraton Park Hotel in Anaheim, however ae appreciate your compliments regarding their hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Ivan!  Thank you again for sharing your review.

Summary: Our family has always stayed at this Sheraton whenever we visit Disneyland. On our most recent stay, housekeeping accidentally threw away my daughter's nightguard that she wears to keep her jaw from locking when she sleeps. Trey, a manager, told us they could reimburse us up to $500 but that we should go through the hotel insurance instead since the nightguard cost us over $700 to have made for her. We completed all the paperwork for the insurance and then once we returned home the general manager, Ian, emailed us that we would not be reimbursed by the hotel insurance company. This is not the first time something like this has happened at this hotel. Several years ago on a previous stay housekeeping accidentally took my daughter's blanket. Luckily, in that case they found it,
Manager Response: Good morning, We apologize for the confusion this entire process has caused. Please follow up with our General Manager Ian with additional concerns as this matter is being handled by him directly.  Thank you and we hope to earn your trust back in the future.

Summary Heading: 2023 Club Level Review -- Modern, Upscale Disneyland Good Neighbor Hotel
Summary: This review emphasizes current 2023 club level experience. Stayed here for 3 nights between Xmas and NYE 2022. We're a gay couple, mid-30s, no kids, but we knew what we were getting into at Disney.   A typical day we experienced as club level guests:   Club lounge is on first floor near lobby. Club rooms are exclusively on the top floor, I believe; so it's a bit of an event go to the lounge as you have to pass by other guests, walk thru corridors, then outside and then into the lobby building to get there. You will be asked to show proof of club access (a paper access card), and depending on the lounge employee working, you might feel a little "pushed" to present this card upon entering. While being exclusive, it’s not a very exclusive experience. There is a back entrance/exit
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your 4/5 review with us, myerffej.  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience with us. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know what we can do to make your stay perfect. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to the appropriate members of our management team so that we may improve moving forward.  We're looking forward to sharing a more enjoyable experience with you soon.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel early January 2023. Rooms were clean. We were able to get adjoining rooms (504/506). Walk to Disneyland/California Adventure Park was about 10-15 minutes which isn’t bad considering the time included waiting for the traffic lights to change  😊.    We got two queen rooms. 504 had a Juliette style balcony and 506 had a regular balcony with a table and two chairs. We faced the garden/pool. It was quiet when the door was closed but if you opened the door it was a little loud as we faced the Main Street on traffic.   Shower was double head, water got hot quickly, beds were comfortable and room did have a coffee machine.  Only had two guest elevators to the rooms. We had a toddler with us and a stroller. Elevators were sometimes busy because we’d have to wait for
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Happy2travel8!  We're thrilled you enjoyed your time with us at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's great to hear you enjoyed your room and found them to be well refreshed. We appreciate the feedback regarding our elevators. Our prime location gets you to Disneyland within minutes! We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disney and friendly staff
Summary: We arrived on December 26. Coming in from Australia we had booked the room for the night before to make sure we could go straight in (particularly knowing it was such a busy time of year). Delays meant we arrived a bit later than anticipated at around 11am. Unfortunately despite contacting the hotel in advance to let them know we weren’t coming in until the 26th the system had cancelled our reservation as a no show (even thought the notes on the system were clearly there). The lovely Sylvia at the front desk was so sweet, calm and reassuring that what could have been a disaster was dealt with really well. We had connecting rooms on the top floor (views the other way from Disney) - one room with two queen beds and a bath in the bathroom and one with a king bed and a huge shower.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Keyah!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our beautiful rooms and Sylvia and our friendly staff, but also our spacious accommodations, ample amenities and convenient location! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary: Spacious rooms with a couch, small table to eat at and large bathroom. The location close to Disneyland (walking distance), Target and there is a CVS  quite close. The shop in the hotel is convenient for snacks, coffees, etc. The staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel is in a nice and safe location. I wasn't on the same side that Disneyland is on but I could watch the fireworks from the window near the lift which was perfectly fine.
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Alison!  We're delighted your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our friendly staff and spacious rooms as well as our convenient location. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience.

Summary: Checked in 31/12/2022. Particularly booked this hotel as a treat - seemed to offer more and was more expensive . Silly me.  Arrived 11am US time. It was a planned celebration holiday for my daughter and I .  At the point of arrival I was told by hotel staff that my booked room was a disability room which was NOT the higher, city view, club lounge room that I had booked and supplied credit card details for.. I Explained this to reception  and also that we were exhausted and had had 2hrs sleep on our flight from AU to LAX and would love an earlier check  In than the mandatory4pm time . Desk staff said come back between 2-3pm room will be ready. We did. I waited in a line of two people at reception for 45 - yes 45!!! Minutes. Any was my too. Ready??  It wasn’t.  Room Ended up being
Manager Response: Good morning. Please reach out to our Operations Manager, Tray Rasberry, directly at travon.rasberry@aimbridge.com to gather more information to better assist. Thank you

Summary Heading: Great Rooms and Common Areas After Remodel
Summary: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland. We booked before the recent renovations were finished and got a great rate. We really enjoyed the remodeled rooms which were clean, modern and felt new. The rooms all have a mini fridge which was helpful and the table in the corner of the room can be adjusted at regular height or turned into a standing desk with a push of the buttons in the middle of the table. We asked for a kettle which was brought up promptly. As well, our bathroom had a large walk in shower and wall shelving which was great for storing things. We had dinners delivered to the hotel while on breaks from the park, and there were many areas to sit in the lobby and also outside near the pool to enjoy our meals. The kids loved the pool and hot tub, and it
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Joeie!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our clean and modern rooms, but also our ample amenities, friendly staff, ideal location and family-friendly atmosphere! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for our Disneyland adventure!!
Summary: I found the hotel that satisfies all of my family’s requirements.  Full length mirror for my wife’s ootd? Check  Streaming services availability such as Netflix and Amazon Prime for the kids?  Check  Modern look with the necessary features such as a central table for charging cables (for the wife and kids)? Check  Bed that my wife states that gave her a good nights’ sleep? Check  Starbucks at the hotel for me as I’m the one doing all the driving and I don’t want to fall in line at the Starbucks at Disney? Check!!  Only some minor complaints: Housekeeping forgetting to fill the teas and tissue paper but they were able to resolve that in a timely manner. And no option to check out from our room   Also, if it’s possible to suggest maybe a discount for the daily parking rate for
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review, ArcadeDaddyO!  We are very proud to hear about the wonderful stay you had at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It is great to hear that you found our amenities, bedding, and accommodations to be so agreeable! We truly value your feedback. We'll take your concerns into consideration as we move forward to improve for the future. We hope you plan on staying with us again soon as we'd love to share another great experience with you.  Thanks again!

Summary: Beautiful hotel except that basic things such as a working bathroom fan so the entire unit doesn’t get humid when someone takes a shower.  Also the unit heating and cooling control is a complete facade. You actually CANNOT control the temperature in your room at all. Our room was 76 degrees at night and we called the front desk multiple times asking them for assistance and they literally spent an hour from 11:30pm to 1am and no one helped us after we called several times and then one call we received they told us that “security confirmed” it was working. No one came to the room and I took pictures of the temperature.  We tried everything. There are all kinds of weird occupancy sensors on the control panel but it doesn’t matter what you push it would just say idle and the
Manager Response: Kristen, thank you for your feedback and please accept our apologies for the challenges you encountered.  We recognize that the older system installed does not have the flexibility of controls we would prefer and which many of our guests demand. Much work has been done to upgrade the mechanism and we continue to work on this to improve air balance to meet the expectations of our customers. I am sorry that we were unable to achieve this during your visit. We trust you will allow us the opportunity to regain your confidence on another occasion.

Summary Heading: Not a great visit this time at the Sheraton in Anaheim CA...
Summary: This was the 3rd time we have stayed at the Sheraton.  Unfortunately after arriving after a 20 hour journey from the UK overall we were disappointed not to be offered the room on the higher floor over looking Disney, which we requested a year ago when we booked the holiday, flight & hotel etc.  Also as part of our package, we were supposed to have a free complimentary room upgrade if available, this did not happen either, we couldn't understand why a room wasn't pre booked and saved for us as we booked a year in advance.  We were told that there was only one room available on level 3, the receptionist informed us that it was a nice room overlooking the pool, but as we had no other choice we had to accept it.  On arriving at the room, we realised it was right next to the lift,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback, PJ.  We are always working very hard to provide the best experiences for all of our guests. It's unfortunate to see that we could not accommodate you in your requested room. We wish that our team went above and beyond to meet your needs. We will share your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide a better experience for you in the future. We look forward to that chance.

Summary: We had arrived early and they were able to accomodate us before the allocated check in time, for which we were most grateful. The room is slightly small, however the beds are comfortable. The shower, unfortunately, was not hot enough and the pressure was weak. We liked that it was along the main road, so walking to Disneyland, we would stock up on water and snacks, which would otherwise be super expensive in the park. It is an easy walk to Cheesecake factory and also PF Changs. All in all, would not mind staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us, GrasianBuddha. We're glad to hear that you were able to check in early and that you found the beds to be comfortable. We're sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the temperature and pressure of the shower and we will be sure to pass along your feedback to our engineering team. It is great to know that you loved our location and found it to be convenient for walking to Disneyland and nearby restaurants. We hope you'll consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: As the tech explained to us, the refurb did NOT include the heating and cooling system. The boiler doesn’t come on until it’s less than 50 degrees outside. Our room is 62 degrees. We’re freezing. The tech brought a space heater for us. Unreal.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, dan_DHRT.  We're disappointed your time with us was less than ideal. We care deeply about the comfort of our guests so we regret the challenges you had with the temperature control system in your room. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We'll be sure to address your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: Decent hotel close to the park. I stayed here as I am a platinum Marriott member so I chose this hotel over other cheaper ones in the Marriott chain as they had a concierge lounge. Do not stay here if you are doing it just for the lounge. The lounge probably had the least amount of stuff I have ever saw. The breakfast was so poor I used my platinum benefit for the restaurant breakfast rather than the bonus points. There were really no snacks throughout the day besides chips and nuts and Reese peeses. The coffee machine was broken the full 5 days we stayed. There were no evening snacks out until well after the appies were cleared and there were no snacks out before dinner. So if you plan on grabbing a snack there may be nothing in the lounge. The evening appies were jalapeño
Manager Response: Thanks for the nice rating, Crystal! We're happy that you loved our comfortable beds, friendly staff and ideal location. We strive to provide our guests with warm hospitality, efficient service, and clean rooms. Regarding your concerns with our amenities, Concierge Lounge and cleanliness, we will bring those to the attention of our management team as we continue to improve for the future.  We'd love to share a more positive experience with you next time.

Summary Heading: Pros and Cons- Ultimately Cannot Recommend
Summary: We usually stay at Disneyland Hotel but since we have already been once this year and were meeting friends from out of state, we decided to stay near them.    The Good:  Rooms are nicely done and above all else, clean!  Beds are comfy.  The location is an easy walk to and from the park (fine for my 10 and 8 year old girls).  Lobby is inviting and pool bar was a welcome break from Disney.  Front desk staff, housekeeping, and engineering were all super friendly and welcoming/helpful.    The Bad:  In what world in the year 2022 does a hotel guest not have full autonomy over the climate control in their room?  The climate control only works until the outside temp falls below a certain level-then it switches off and only circulates outside air through the cooling system.  Newsflash:
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Outgunned3to1.  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us and enjoyed our clean, comfortable accommodations, kind staff, and ideal location. However, we're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. We regret that our accommodations didn't meet your expectations. We'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 5days with family. Rooms are big and clean. Beds are quite comfortable. There is a coffee percolator in rooms but we prefer tea so a kettle was provided at request. Lovely views of Disney which is in walking distance. Service here is great. Staff was helpful. There are lots of options to have breakfast either in the hotel restaurant or outside. We had some days in IHOP nearby. Generally had a lovely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words!  It's excellent you enjoyed your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We pride ourselves in offering a clean and comfortable environment for all of our guests and your praise tells us we're succeeding. Thank you again for sharing your review with us!  We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary Heading: Very nice renovated hotel close to the convention center.
Summary: Nice renovated hotel close to convention center; staff was friendly, and the initial room that we got was not our likely and they were more than happy to give us a different room. The restaurant on the first floor that specializes in Italian and stone oven pizzas is excellent. Do not take rooms on the first floor particularly if they have a view of the parking lot. Ask for rooms overlooking the pool starting on the second floor. You must know that the rooms overlooking the parking lot at night are able to see the fireworks at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the splendid review!  It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort and that our team took such great care of you. We want you to feel right at home as soon as you walk through our doors! Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you.

Summary Heading: Friendly welcoming staff and clean facilities
Summary: We recently visited Sheraton Park Hotel and had great time. Upon entering the hotel, we were impressed with the upgrades and changes to the lobby and the rest of the hotel. As we walked up to the front desk check in, Jonathan greeted us and took very good care of us to provide hotel information, a map to our room, and details on the Sheraton Club Lounge.   Our room had two beds and they were very comfortable. This room even had a balcony and it faced Disneyland so we were able to see a little bit of the fireworks. I think we needed to be  little higher up to see all of the fireworks, but we got a little bit of it during the night.   The club lounge was nice, clean, and had friendly service. They greeted me by name every time I entered the lounge. For breakfast they had one hot
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review! We are pleased to hear that you had such a positive experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. We are pleased to hear you had a nice interaction with our front desk team, and that you found your room to be clean, comfortable, with a beautiful view! We are also delighted that you enjoyed our club lounge. We appreciate the feedback regarding our breakfast options, and will address this with our food and beverage team. We look forward too seeing you again next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Stay Here if You Like Customer Service
Summary: Customer service is my focal point anywhere I travel. My stay at the Sheraton has been a blessing. We came to celebrate our anniversary, Halloween. Adrian went WELL above and beyond to make sure that our stay was like none ever before. The Savor Team, Francisco and the others working also did an amazing job. Our meals were perfectly delivered and were completely enjoyable! I feel like this is how everyone is treated when they stay at this property! The stay was exceptional and it all started with a young man, Adrian, knocking it out of the park!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating, David!  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much. It's wonderful to know that your interactions with our staff have been so positive. We strive to provide each guest with exceptional service and we're so glad that several members of our team went above and beyond to ensure your satisfaction. We'll be sure to pass your compliments along to our team.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms and friendly staff
Summary: We had a wonderful three night stay. We were greeted warmly by Irving. Rooms are small but fully renovated, we had a 2 queen size bed room. It was very clean and without asking new linens were delivered each day and the room made up. We followed the advice in reviews on this platform and got a high floor room with a park view. It was very quiet at night. We watched the fireworks our first night from our room. It was an easy walk to the property. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Sarah!  We're thrilled you had such a fantastic stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's excellent your room was refreshed properly and that you appreciated our comfortable and clean facilities. We strive for excellence and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another fantastic experience. Thank you again for sharing your feedback!

Summary: I was here for a night to go to the parks. Wish I could have stayed longer! Beautiful hotel. The lounge sucks! As an Ambassador I have been to several lounges and this one was just horrible. Horrible food choices. The restaurant downstairs is nice for breakfast and dinner. Would definitely stay here again, but will stay away from the lounge.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us, omomojaf.  We appreciate the time you've taken to leave us your feedback. Hearing our guests' suggestions are extremely important to us. With that being said, we'll be sure to look into your concerns moving forward. We want to make sure those missteps​ are erased for our future guests.  Once again, we appreciate the time you've taken to leave us a review. If there's any way we can accommodate you during a future visit, please let us know.

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay, no extra charges and the hotel is really nice Neely renovated and location is walking distance to Disneyland. Great having a Starbucks and store in the hotel and facilities were perfect for us. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review, Ntegra!  We're thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're pleased to hear you appreciated not only our lovely property and convenient location near Disneyland, but also our on-site dining options! Your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We can't wait to host you again for yet another unforgettable visit!

Summary Heading: 2nd stay - noisy this time but not a deal breaker for future stays
Summary: Our first stay at the Sheraton Park was in May 2022. They were able to accommodate us immediately when our timeshare reservation fell thru. We loved the hotel during our first stay (6 nights) for our family of 4, even though we were a little cramped.  The room was very nicely updated and clean.   We had the chance to visit DLR again in Sept. 2022 and needed just one night stay, so we again chose the Sheraton because of our recent positive experience there.  We were able to check in early to room #1214 - same size room as before, however this room was so LOUD.  It was near the elevator and I was concerned we'd hear people talking, etc. but no, what we heard was nearly CONSTANT noise within the walls - presumably the sound of the elevator moving up and down and stopping on our
Manager Response: We appreciate that you took the time to share your feedback, TPN1972.  We're glad you had a pleasant stay with us despite our services not exceeding your expectations. We've addressed your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We hope to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience that our guests are accustomed to.

Summary Heading: Great staff - great location- nice hotel
Summary: Rocio checked us in and my kids and I agree, she was the friendliest and most hospitable person we ever encountered at a hotel check in.  She was legitimately good hearted and genuine.  Thank you Rocio, it really started our stay off on the right foot.   The room was new and very nice, many outlets and ports for charging the various devices, which is a plus.  The storage was lacking- but we made it work for a short stay.  I can’t imagine how a family could function with a small closet and 2 small drawers, but we were fine since it was short.  The balcony was nice and our view of the pool was nice, we could see the fireworks from the hall near the elevator if we wanted to.     The room was serviced each day and cleaned nicely.  They leave a bottle of water and an easy to use
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, MaggieHy!  We appreciate your compliments regarding our hardworking team, ideal location, and cleanliness. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service to our guests and we strive to go above and beyond expectations. We truly value your feedback. We'll take your concerns into consideration as we move forward to improve for the future. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Thank you again for sharing your review and for staying at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Nice updated rooms but bedbugs aren’t a big deal to them.
Summary: We stayed at the Sheraton for the D23 Disney expo because it was offered at a convention rate. We are Disneyland annual pass holders and stay at many Anaheim area hotels. The hotel itself was very nice and we liked our updated room. However, the next morning as we were getting ready for the convention I noticed a batch of red bumps on my leg that were not there the day before and  I realized must have been bitten by bedbugs. I called the hotel 2-3 times the next week because I figured at the very least they would like to inspect the room that I stayed in to verify and deal with the issues before it happened to another guest.  I left messages with the front desk clerks and they said the manager was there but “ walking the grounds” or not at the office. I honestly expected them to
Manager Response: Christinaofcali, thank you for your feedback and we regret your negative experience. Our team treats seriously any comments of this nature and appreciates the opportunity to investigate such a claim before jumping to conclusions. We are disapointed that your call was not returned to address your concern with you directly during your stay. We trust we will have the opportunity to regain your confidence on anonther occasion

Summary: Nice hotel with impressive lobby area. The shop inside the hotel was great as you could buy snacks, drinks,souvenirs,toiletries,medication etc. Also has a Starbucks which was handy in the morning. Our room was very nice although as usual I couldn’t work out the aircon. Wish they would leave instructions. It got a bit hot in there. We had a balcony overlooking the pool. We used neither. There is parking available but again we didn’t use it. The hotel is situated near a large junction with Walgreens on one corner and CVS on the other. S Harbor Blvd is the road where Disney is located and contains numerous hotels and restaurants etc. The hotel is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland which doesn’t sound much but is a killer after a day at the parks. There are shuttle buses which stop at
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, Jinkies2013.  While it's great you enjoyed your time with us so much and enjoyed our impressive lobby, convenient hotel shop and Starbucks, lovely rooms and available parking, we regret that our location, temperature control system and shuttle service didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback with our management team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: Love the new makeover - hotel is looking great. Easy walk to Disneyland and DCA  Excellent from of house staff.  Negatives - with the makeover the room we had no longer had any storage - really annoying.  Water pressure still sucks, even though the new bathrooms are beautiful
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, Compass49509579159, and for your continued patronage.  We're glad to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It's pleasing to hear you enjoyed our updated accommodations as well as our convenient location near DCA and Disneyland. We truly value your feedback regarding our storage options and water pressure. We'll take this into consideration as we move forward to improve for the future.  We look forward to hosting you again next time you're in town.

Summary Heading: Rinky-dink room, stinky toiletries, inconsistent staff
Summary: Room was super tiny, a tight squeeze for just 3 people. Also, toiletries smelled like man perfume, and we were all women! Baffling a large chain hotel would not pick a more neutral fragrance  from Gilchrist and Soames! Staff also not trained well--some rude and condescending, and some very helpful. Only decent thing about stay was location to Disneyland and convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We regret that your experience with us was less than ideal. We're disappointed to hear the service you received wasn't up to par. Providing our guests with exceptional service is something we take seriously. Please know this will be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future.  We hope you'll give us another chance to show you the service we're truly capable of providing.

Summary Heading: Worst Place to Stay around Disneyland
Summary: We decided to try the newly renovated Sheraton by the Convention Center as we took our 4 year old for her birthday. We have season tickets and stay at least 4 to five days a month to go to the Park. We have stayed at the Springhill Suites the last 4 times we have gone to Disneyland. We have also stayed at other Marriott properties and had great times. When we arrived it was very busy and only 1 person at the desk. Another was standing there but not taking guests. The gentleman working the desk was working as fast as he could while the lady was just sitting behind the desk. Finally when it was our turn, the room we had requested was not available so he was kind enough and got us a room so we didn’t have to wait and could put our stuff in the room before heading to the Park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can tell this hotel has just been renovated, as the rooms are really spacious and modern - really comfortable after a day in the theme park! As it was our honeymoon, the lady who checked us in kindly gave us a room on the top floor with views of the Disney fireworks (thank you!)
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review, Emma!  It's wonderful you had such a fantastic stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! The comfort and happiness of our guests are important to us. We're thrilled you enjoyed our large and comfortable rooms so much. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!

Summary: Hotel is amazing! Rooms are clean, fresh and very spacious (and the view from my room was unbeatable!). Starbucks and a restaurant in the lobby, very convenient and makes the early morning walks to Disney bearable. About a 10-15 min walk to Disney so cannot complain. There are diners, restaurants and convenience shops surrounding so it’s a great location. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Will be bringing my family back here for sure!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, 754natashaj!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our spacious accommodations and friendly staff, but also our convenient location near the city's greatest attractions! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary: Stayed here a few nights recently, chose the Sheraton to be close to the convention center for a conference.   Rocio made check-in a pleasure, she was so sweet, funny, and knowledgeable. She was able to give us a quiet room as requested, and really got our stay off to a great start. We crossed paths later and she asked how we liked our room, and she truly cared.  Rooms are beautiful. Really thoughtfully chosen modern touches. Large tv. Nice balconies. Elevators are quick. The world market is super convenient for grab and go snacks or drinks. Self park is easy.   I would actually give this hotel more like 4.5 stars... but would be 5 if they bring back room service! Would stay here again if I needed a hotel close to Disneyland or the convention center for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this 4/5 review!  We're so glad to hear your time with us was so enjoyable! We're delighted you appreciated our location, modern features, and team. We care deeply about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address your concerns regarding our room service with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward. We strive for excellence so we look forward to sharing an even more positive experience with you soon!

Summary: We were greeted by Rocio (apologies if misspelled) at check in after arriving from Canada.  Her professionalism, knowledge of the area and over all personality was amazing.  This was without a doubt the best check in experience we have ever had.  Keep this woman on your team Sheraton!!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate the outstanding review, allenhU720PG!  We're so glad that you chose to stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's wonderful to know that Rocio had such a positive impact on the quality of your experience. Our staff is dedicated to providing our guests with courteous and attentive service, and we're delighted to know that she went above and beyond in this regard.  We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another excellent experience with you soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary Heading: An old name with a new look.
Summary: We arrived to a very newly renovated and fabulous Sheraton Park at Anaheim Resort. From the moment you step into the vast lobby, to the time to arrive into your well appointed room, nothing disappoint.  The property is dotted with good amenities like pool, pool bar, on site laundry (very handy for those long stay and sweaty after Disney days), cafe and a convenient store with Starbucks.  Staff are fantastic, literally from valet to check in, and even housekeeping and maintenance - we encountered them all, and they all responded quickly and were reassuring.  Now, to the rooms. They are spacious, modern and clean. It has a warm and inviting feeling to everything, and the bed is extremely comfortable. The technology upgrade amazed us so much that when we first figured out that the
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, mandikin!  It's great you appreciated your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We take great pride in offering a stunning atmosphere for our guests and your praise for our decor lets us know we're doing our job. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a splendid day!

Summary: This hotel was close to Disney which was nice for our stay and rooms were decent enough.  However, the room next to us had LOUD construction going on for renovations. My husband and I let that go because it was the middle of the day and we were leaving anyways. But then promptly at 9 am on a SATURDAY after getting back late from Disney, they started construction again. Absolutely ridiculous and disrespectful for the guests staying here. You would think they would at least wait until the check out time to start anything. It’s Saturday for Pete’s sake. Thankfully we don’t have kids staying with us or anything and they were not woken up too. Husband called front desk and they offered us a late check out, so we can listen to it longer? No thank you. Will not being staying here again
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Shannon.  It's unfortunate that you had such challenges during your time with us. We regret your inconvenience as we are making some renovations to further improve on our hotel. We do hope you come back to stay with us again to take advantage of our improvements.  Thank you again for your feedback and for bringing this to our attention.

Summary: Overall experience was good. Room was clean and housekeeping were attentive. But it lacked storage space, which was a bit of a pain as we stayed here for 8 nights. And the fact that they placed us right next to an elevator shaft for that length of time was completely inappropriate. We didn’t realise until it was too late and our sleep was very disturbed for our entire stay. Our request for a lower floor due to my fear of heights was honoured, which was good. Would likely do a shorter stay here in future, as long as we were away from elevator.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, Kerry M!  We are glad you had a great experience with us! We are disappointed to see some of your concerns, and we will let our team know about them. We always work very hard to make sure all of our guests have a pleasant stay. We look forward to hosting you again for an even better experience.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great stay but watch out for parking charges
Summary: Stayed for one night while visiting Disney. The hotel has just been refurbed and looks great from the lobby area down to the guest rooms. We were put on the 14th floor with lovely views over Anaheim. It’s a very easy walk to Disney, around 10-15 minutes and it felt very safe to walk back at night after the fireworks. Staff were lovely to deal with.  2 small comments, house keeping knocked on my door at 8.30 on checkout morning which woke me up.  We paid for parking at the machine on our way out. However the hotel has since charged for one night parking on my credit card. I did not give permission for this, nor was it explained to us not to pay for parking at the machine. I have rung the front desk 3 times with no answer and sent a message on Instagram and Facebook asking for a
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  We as a team apologize for the confusion and not getting an answer when contacting the hotel. If you have a moment, you can contact me directly at Travon.rasberry@aimhosp.com. I would be more than happy to refund the parking on your bill, I would just need a receipt showing you paying at the station. Again I apologize it wasn’t communicated during your stay.  Have a great day

Summary: Issa and toren both greeted me with kindness and were very jovial! Thank you ladies!! I could tell (because I spent an hour at the bar) you are short staffed but you never showed any stress towards customers or each other.   To the man that stormed away as I tried to explain you’d be back and showed him my amazing food…try to be kind, patient, and get adequate sleep so you don’t blow it on people working Really hard for you and their own families.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, teric959!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Issa and Toren! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Very nice place and location! A little too stringent on the pet policy.
Summary: Looks like the place was modernized recently. Nice ambience with a nice pool.  Liked how they have a pool bar/restaurant which gave it a cool resort feel.    We brought our service dog and although it wasn’t a problem we were told that we couldn’t leave the dog unattended in the room. It kind of took us by surprise because it’s difficult to abide by that completely.   When we stayed at the Hyatt, it wasn’t an issue to periodically leave our service animal alone. Marriott might want to consider being a little bit more flexible.   Otherwise this is a great property and close to Disneyland. Parking was $25 a night which seems to be the going rate in that area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your 4/5 review with us, Richard.  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience with us. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know what we can do to make your stay perfect. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We're looking forward to sharing a more enjoyable experience with you soon. Thank you again and have a lovely day!

Summary: (1) Trip.com made a mistake on my booking. I booked a room with one king bed (I have a screenshot of the booking confirmation page), but Trip.com booked a room with two full-size beds. This was a vacation trip for me and my wife. It sent the wrong message, and completely destroyed the mood. When we arrived, the hotel clerk was rude to refuse to correct the mistake made by Trip.com. The clerk basically told us to take the two beds or leave. Bad customer service, terrible.  (2) The bathroom was NOT clean. It looked like someone took a shower with dirty feet and left mud on the floor. Three nights, and no one bothered to clean it. Terrible hygiene.  (3) Hotel does NOT offer shuttle to Disneyland. It was fine to walk to Disneyland. But after a full day of walking, the 30 minutes
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  It's unfortunate you had such challenges during your time with us. We strive to offer quality service and convenience for our guests. We're disheartened our service, accommodations, and cleanliness didn't meet your expectations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll be sure to discuss your review and concerns moving forward.  We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.

Summary: We came late today and found out that our reservation in another hotel was wrong. We entered the Sheraton park hotel at the Anaheim resort and the amazing Irving ( the manager ) from the front desk  assist us. He was so great, professional and nice , and we would come back to Sheraton because of this great service. We are really appreciate that.   K. Klausner
Manager Response: We appreciate the outstanding review, _J7616XO!  We're so glad that you chose to stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's wonderful to know that Irving had such a positive impact on the quality of your experience. Our staff is dedicated to providing our guests with courteous and attentive service, and we're delighted to know that he went above and beyond in this regard.  We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another excellent experience with you soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: Hotel was very nice and staff was very helpful and friendly. The ART bus stops directly in front of the hotel making access to the parks very easy. You can also choose to walk which we did the first night but the ART bus is worth the $6 per day (or $16 for 3 day pass).  Also had breakfast one morning at the restaurant which is a much better option than eating at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review!  We're thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're pleased to hear you appreciated not only our location and team, but also our amenities! Your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We can't wait to host you again for yet another unforgettable visit!

Summary: We loved our stay here! The hotel is newly remodeled and looks amazing! The beds  are extremely comfortable and the views from the room are amazing! We didn’t have a Disney view and still thought it was a great view! The walk to Disney wasn’t too bad either! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Micheleshore!  We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's wonderful to know that our modern design and stunning views, as well as our comfortable beds, left a lasting impression. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in town!

Summary: We usually stay at a nearby Marriott property, but when unread this had been renovated, we decided to give it a try. Hotel was gorgeous inside. Staff was helpful and friendly!  Great location near Disneyland.  Room was a bit small for a family of 4, but it was well designed and  we were barely in our room anyway.
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Stacysa!  We're delighted your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our refreshed facilities and courteous staff as well as our prime location. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience.  Have an amazing day!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, location, and staff! Right next to Disneyland!
Summary: Had an amazing time at the Sheraton Park Hotel! The hotel was very clean! Room #141 was the best room for people with pets. The staff was amazing and very accommodating. We got free hi-speed internet sesrvice as a Marriott Bon Voy member. We accidentally left our van door wide open and thanks to security, nothing was stolen from our vehicle.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us this fabulous review, 287julietm!  We're so glad you had such an enjoyable time with us at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We care deeply about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so it's wonderful you appreciated our central location. We love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many excellent attractions.  We look forward to hosting you again for yet another unforgettable stay!

Summary: This hotel is absolutely gorgeous. All the staff were helpful and friendly but especially Alexis who checked us in. She was professional, welcoming, and knowledgeable. She definitely put our stay off to an excellent start. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the lovely review, JonesSally2021!  We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's wonderful that you enjoyed the design and atmosphere of the hotel - that's what we like to hear! We're looking forward to your next stay with us for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!

Summary Heading: Stuff stolen from room, low communication
Summary: I’ve been a long time guest of the Sheraton. I’ve been coming here with my family since I was 11 years old and have never had any issues with this establishment. This last visit, though, ruined everything for me. My boyfriend and I had stayed here in December of 2021 while the Sheraton was being renovated and got invited back to stay again with a 20% discount. We came back because that’s a pretty good deal. On the day of June 17th, we had left for the theme park and came back at around 3pm to rest, we put up a privacy tag so no one would enter the room. At around 4pm, someone had entered our room unannounced and I had to announce that people were in the room, then they left. We thought it could have been an honest mistake, we didn’t even know who it was since they didn’t say who
Manager Response: Jamie, thank you for your message and please, again, accept our apologies for the challenges you encountered. We empathize with your circumstances and want to do everything we can to minimize the inconvenience caused. We are concerned that you considered our approach unsupportive and regret this perception, but please rest assured that the parties now involved in handling you case will be following through with a call, as suggested.

Summary: Sorry, but as a family we did not enjoy this hotel. Let’s start with the room. Very small for a family of four, not enough chairs for us to sit and dine if we do order takeout. Very small fridge that doesn’t seem to keep your items cold, mini freezer did not work as we brought many ice packs to bring to the trip since Disney doesn’t allow loose ice. No microwave. There were issues with the bedding and blankets, lots of flyaway dusts. We wore black tshirts and you can clearly see that we looked like we slept with a dog. The blankets also make cracking noise— easy to wake up the kids. Next, are the elevators, I know is newly remodeled but the elevators sure don’t look like it did. We stayed on the fourth floor and the elevators do not indicate if you are going up or down, we
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than perfect. We're always looking into feedback to continue to grow our establishment. We'll be sure to address your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward to help us to improve for the future.  We do hope you allow us the opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Always ask what events are taking place
Summary: The place is incredibly understaffed and incredibly slow when it comes to management. Key door wouldn’t open and went down four times to get it recharged. Instead of just seeing if there was an open room, they sent maintenance which took another 30min. Staff was not very friendly about the experience. They had two weddings going on, but whoever is managing this place needs to get retrained. Just always ask what events are happening the day you arrive, otherwise, you’ll likely end up like me with the same experience. Had to miss a large portion of an impt event.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and constructive criticism. We apologize for the inconvenience but trust we will have the opportunity to regain your confidence on another occasion.

Summary: Really helpful staff that helped us navigate our Disneyland trip. Nice pool, easy breakfast arrangement, clean and spacious rooms. Enjoyable stay so close to the park, it's ideal. Will be returning!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Fleetwood16!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our helpful staff and our amenities, but also our clean, spacious accommodations and our convenient location! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!

Summary: My family and I had THE best experience here this weekend. We were treated like family each step of the way. After first arriving there was no self parking due to a busy morning at the hotel. I was told to valet and they would hold the car until space opened up. What great advice! Then my room was not ready but I was given a pre registration card to access all of the facilities including a newly renovated gym. When my room became ready I encountered my favorite two people of the whole weekend Rocio and Alexis who were so friendly and accommodating and who ended up upgrading our room so that we could see fireworks and have a full balcony. We were able to get breakfast and play games in the club lounge. This whole experience will definitely bring us back! Thanks all at the
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!  It's excellent you had such a fantastic experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests and your praise for our team lets us know we're doing our job. Rocio and Alexis are valued members of our team so it's no surprise that they took such great care of you. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing another splendid experience with you soon!

Summary Heading: The best staff and amazing room
Summary: Just checked in to the hotel and had the best experience with Rocio at the front desk. She was so sweet and so nice. She upgraded us to a great room with a view and my kids loved it. The room was so beautiful and clean. It’s been beautifully remodeled. The beds are comfy and I love the esthetic of the room. I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  It's outstanding your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so amazing. We love sharing our excellent service with each person who walks through our door. It's team members like Rocio who ensure our guests are getting the best level of service. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can once again share our high-caliber service with you.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful. It is so modern, clean and updated.  The decor, the different seating areas were very impressive. I checked in around 7pm and was happy to see the cafe was still open.. My husband was happy to see the game on the big screens in the lobby bar area. Alexis assisted us and went above and beyond to serve us. She was very friendly and professional.  She  was so knowledgeable and offered us the best options. We really felt right at home. Staff like her makes me want to come back. I also want to me mention throughout my visit the staff was  very friendly. The valet attendant was also  very helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing this lovely review, Jossie!  We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's our pleasure to accommodate you and we appreciate your praise. Alexis is an excellent member of our team. She always goes above and beyond for our guests. You can see why we love having her here so much!  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: Polite and friendly front desk. Comfortable room - not huge but well designed with lots of shelf space for bags. Sliding bathroom door. Great pool area. Bonvoy elite lounge good for breakfast - offerings aren't fancy but enough variety that everyone can be happy and space is very pleasant and consistently all staff are friendly, respectful and pleasant. Never tried the evening lounge offerings. Good housekeeping standards. Ten minute walk to the park and a Walgreens on the opposite corner to the hotel for emergency needs. Valet parking done well. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating!  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort so much. It's wonderful to know that your interactions with our staff have been so positive. We strive to provide each guest with exceptional service and we're so glad that several members of our team went above and beyond to ensure your satisfaction. We'll be sure to pass your compliments along to our team.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary Heading: The Sheraton saved our Disney vacation!
Summary: Our family of 4 recently stayed 6 nights at the Sheraton in Anaheim.  After trying to check in to a timeshare, we were told our reservation had been cancelled (not the fault of the timeshare) and after spending nearly 2 hours on the phone, we could not get another timeshare reservation since it was a busy Mother's Day weekend.  We were able to find immediate availability for the week at the Sheraton, which was within walking distance of the timeshare (we did not have a car), and we were able to continue with our vacation.  I had never stayed at a Sheraton before, but really enjoyed this location.  The lobby was beautiful and smelled amazing!  We had a room on the 9th floor with a balcony and 2 queen beds.  It was a little tight for 4 of us, but the room was clean and we had a
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  It's outstanding your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so fantastic! We're thrilled you enjoyed our gorgeous views, amenities, and location so much. We strive for excellence and your praise for our cleanliness and on-site accommodations lets us know we're doing our job! We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you!

Summary: The best staff ever! Alexis at the front desk is absolutely the most professional employee! The stack at the pool was also great, Tray and Sal! Great service with always a smile on their faces The hotel was very clean and it smells really nice  The room was impeccable! Clean sheets and towels Nice, big 📺 tv
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review with us!  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We also appreciate your kind words regarding our team. We're pleased to know that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fabulous to hear! Your praise is not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share yet another unforgettable visit with you someday!

Summary: I was here for a conference at the convention center. I liked the garden setting, newly remodeled room, lobby, and pool. Staff were very nice.  Lobby was bright, new, and quiet. Room had a balcony and I was able to watch fireworks from Disneyland. They have a starbucks, pizza restaurant, and Morton’s steakhouse for convenient dining. The only thing was when I called the help line a couple times from my room, just got a voicemail. Then I just called the dine in line and they were able to help me. Another thing is be sure to keep the yellow parking ticket they give you. You can scan it at the gate in order to get in and out of the parking lot. Then you just pay for parking at the end of your stay. I will book here again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're thrilled you had such a wonderful experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's excellent you enjoyed and appreciated our great decor as well as our ambiance and atmosphere. We care about the happiness and comfort of our guests. We can't wait to host you again soon so we can share another fantastic experience with you soon!  Have an outstanding day!

Summary: THANK YOU LUIS! I was travelling on my honeymoon with my husband and Luis made it his mission to ensure we had a special and warming stay! Not only did he attend immediately to all our requests but he also gave us a few beautiful gifts throughout to make sure we felt extra special.  Thank you Sheraton for your lovely service and wonderful staff we’ll definitely be back and recommend to all!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  We're delighted to hear that you had such an outstanding experience with our team at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's wonderful that Luis provided you with such great service - that's what we like to hear! We'd love to host you again soon for another incredible experience!  Thanks for sharing and have a terrific day!

Summary: Wonderful hotel. Staff are exceptional. Went above and beyond to help us after a traumatic trip to the hotel. Alexis was outstanding and spent hours fixing our Disney registration mess. Rooms are excellent. The restaurant was great - and the Hotel location is perfect for Disneyland. Just loved our stay here. Would come back in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: We appreciate the outstanding review, Michael!  We're so glad that you chose to stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. It's wonderful to know that Alexis had such a positive impact on the quality of your experience. Our staff is dedicated to providing our guests with courteous and attentive service, and we're delighted to know that she went above and beyond in this regard.  We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another excellent experience with you soon. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: Not far from disneyland park, very nice clean environment, looks newly renovated friendly staff, great pool and hot tub would recommend. Good little shop downstairs with yummy breakfasts and snacks. Good parking lot space
Manager Response: Thanks for the 4/5 review!  We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! It's wonderful that you loved our location, cleanliness, modern facilities, amenities, and team, along with our food offerings! We'd love to have you back again soon to share an even more positive experience with you. Please let us know how we can make your next visit perfect.

Summary: I stayed here with my friend, and we had a great stay! It is a great location! It’s very close to the Disney parks, about a 10 minute walk, and you can even see the fireworks from the hotel in the evening. It’s also got plenty of good restaurants within walking distance! The pool area is also really nice, and it is very convenient to have a shop within the hotel to grab some food. Our room was really nice, only thing is really say is that there was very minimal storage. Staff were always very helpful. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this lovely review, Lauren!  We're so glad to know you had such an enjoyable experience with us at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort. We're also thrilled you enjoyed our central location and proximity to so many of the city's best attractions. We'd love to host you again so we can share yet another unforgettable experience with you!

Summary: This is exactly the kind of service and quality I expect as a Gold Elite member. I had an extremely bad experience at another Marriott property here in Anaheim so I switched to this location. Alexis at the front dest was absolutely SUPERB!! She assured me this hotel was nice and quiet and she was so attentive to my needs as I’m sure I looked pretty rough upon arriving after several nights of anguish. She made me feel welcome and comforted!! I slept like a baby and will now only stay at this property when I come to Anaheim (which is quite often). Highly recommend this property as it’s “home away from home”.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort! We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Alexis! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a lovely day!

Summary: We stayed here for 6 days last week of February 2023.  The hotel is a short 15 minute walk to Disney and right across road from IHOP so we gave it 5 stars for location.  The hotel has been renovated and is very nice.  Staff are very friendly and all of hotel is so clean. There is sometimes a bit of a wait for the elevators but not a big deal. It was too cold to use the pool but it looked very nice.  Laundry room available as well.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  We're delighted your time at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location near Disney's best attractions! We're glad to hear your enjoyed our updated spaces as well as our plentiful amenities. Our team will be happy to hear that we made such a positive impact on your visit! We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Please come see us again soon!

Summary: Beautiful clean upgraded hotel. The pool area is very nice with garden and trees. You can enjoy a drink as there is a pool bar. I very happy with our room. We will return to this hotel when we are back in the area. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and rating, comingforthesun!  We're happy that your overall stay at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort was enjoyable and that you were able to take advantage of our pool area. It's great that you appreciated our clean accommodations and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another wonderful visit!  Thank you again for sharing your feedback!

Summary: Lovely hotel, rooms are updated and large. Asked for a high floor and had a view of Disney parks and night time show! Staff were friendly and approachable, accommodated a late checkout at 4pm which was handy for a 10pm flight. Would definitely recommend
Room tip: Ask for higher room, waiting for lifts can be a pain during busy times
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review, 93jacquim!  We are delighted to hear about your experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort and loved our spacious accommodations with beautiful views! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our team. It's wonderful that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future.

Summary: This luxurious hotel had helpful staff and the over night staff helped me and my partner login to the hotel’s wifi. This is a great place to stay if you plan to go to the nearby amusement park! Everything was within walking-distance which includes breakfast downstairs of the hotel. Would highly recommend for anyone going on vacation or just needing to escape to a hotel that has it all.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Rachel!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience at Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Thank you again for taking the time to leave your feedback!

Summary: I've now had two stays at this property and can definitely say it's a wonderful value. On both of my stays I've had the opportunity to be in what appears to be recently remodeled rooms that have a decent layout, are clean, and have ample towels. We are marriot Platinum and on both occasions we've received Club lounge access as well as being granted a late checkout. The lounge is perfectly adequate with light snacks in the day (chips, candy, nuts, water, soda, coffee) and some basic appetizers (taquitos, jalapeno poppers, meatballs) and two alcholic drinks (per room) in the evenings. The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland which was great when I needed to return to the room for my son’s nap. I also appreciated the ability to leave our car in the hotel lot until after we were done
Room tip: Rooms with view of Disneyland Fireworks are great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the continued support, Enrique S! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our remodeled rooms, and that you found your space to be well maintained. It is also great to learn that you enjoyed our club lounge and that you were able to take advantage of late checkout. We are happy to hear that you appreciated the short walk to Disneyland, and that you had a fantastic anniversary dinner! We do regret to hear of the water problems in your room due to some nasty storms, but are refreshed to hear that we went above and beyond to ensure we were able to provide you with an excellent experience. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Completely renovated, this hotel, a short walk to Disneyland , was fantastic.
